communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: I'm navigating my early recovery while starting college. Balancing three science classes and a part-time job at the campus library, I'm learning to manage stress and support others in similar situations. Living at home but aiming for dorm life next year, I'm focused on small victories and mutual support.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0006_ba5ac2! I share my journey of leaving harmful communities and help others with recovery steps, mutual support, and resource sharing. Let's celebrate every step forward together!
